alert.note: Alert for Indian Wells Valley; Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 12 at 2:24AM PST until December 12 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22 expected. * WHERE...Mojave Desert and Indian Wells Valley. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
